root.text: Sudden severe shortness of breath (wheezing, shallow, anxiety)?

sofort.text:
⚠️ Acute breathing difficulty!
1. Sit upright (tripod position), reassure.
2. Loosen tight clothing, fresh air.
3. Use own inhaler (if available).
4. No improvement → call 112.

unsicher.text: When in doubt, call 112 – breathing problems are serious.
